comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Think I'm bad... Shoulda' seen what those other dorks were looking at. But dammit, I wish Bailey hadn't outed me. Now I have to go back to the library, and I _hate_ PCs. Not to mention: "Whatcha' lookin' at mister?" "Go away kid." DU

comments.author: Tim
comments.body: Looks like Steve is already testing the effectiveness of this years Halloween costume. Consider yourself CAUGHT...! Adrianna, I hope your seeing this.
